attributes.action: General Election before Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union is triggered
attributes.additional_details: With the multiple lies, half truths, scaremongering, etc that was involved in the campaigning of the referendum (on both sides), I believe it is only fair that the people get to make a decision where promises that are made can be held accountable.
attributes.background: Following the result of the EU referendum (in which 52% of the vote called for the UK to leave the EU), the task of the government has drastically changed. However, due to the binary system of the vote (remain/leave), the government does not know exactly what its people want from the "Brexit".
